title: Out of the total tenements, at least 40% tenements shall be of (1) carpet area not more than 30 sq
clause_text: Out of the total tenements, at least 40% tenements shall be of (1) carpet area not more than 30 sq.m.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
